post:
I've got a Namecheap Black Friday promotional dedicated server and now I want to give it out.

Configuration listed below:

> HDD: 1TB SATA

> RAM: 8GB

> Bandwidth: 100TB

> Port Speed: 100 Mbps

> 2 IPs

> IPMI Access

Its monthly price is $48.88 (same as renewal) and will due on 1 Jan 2015.

If you need this server (with $10 one-time fee) please contact me, I will transfer it to your Namecheap account.
